oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Supported Version of Firefox Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Use of versions of an application which are not supported by the vendor are not permitted. Vendors respond to security flaws with updates and patches. These updates are not available for unsupported versions which can leave the application vulnerable to attack.

oval-def:criterion.comment: installed version of firefox supported

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Mozilla Firefox
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The application installed on the system is firefox.

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

oval-def:criterion.comment: Firefox is installed

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to disable the installation of extensions.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable extension installation in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting InstallAddonsPermission.Default to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox autoplay must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable autoplay for videos with audio content in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Permissions.Autoplay.Default to 'block-audio-video'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enabled Firefox Cryptomining protection
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Enable tracking protection for cryptomining in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting EnableTrackingProtection.Cryptomining to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Development Tools
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable developer tools in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableDeveloperTools to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox deprecated ciphers
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable deprecated ciphers in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting DisabledCiphers.TLS_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to disable form fill assistance.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable form fill history. in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableFormHistory to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Pocket
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Pocket in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisablePocket to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Studies
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Studies in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableFirefoxStudies to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured so that DNS over HTTPS is disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable DNS over HTTPS in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting DNSOverHTTPS.Enabled to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox encrypted media extensions must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Site Feedback in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting EncryptedMediaExtensions.Enabled to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting EncryptedMediaExtensions.Locked to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enabled Firefox Enhanced Tracking Protection
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Enable enhanced tracking protection in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.browser.contentblocking.category.Value to 'strict'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.browser.contentblocking.category.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disabled Firefox Extension Recommendations
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox extension recommendations in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.extensions.htmlaboutaddons.recommendations.enabled.Value to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.extensions.htmlaboutaddons.recommendations.enabled.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to not automatically update installed add-ons and plugins.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable addon and plugin automatic update in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .ExtensionUpdate to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox feedback reporting must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Site Feedback in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableFeedbackCommands to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enabled Firefox Fingerprinting Protection
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Enable tracking protection for fingerprinting in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting EnableTrackingProtection.Fingerprinting to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must prevent the user from quickly deleting data.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Forget button in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableForgetButton to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Raise Or Lower Windows Capability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable addon and plugin automatic update in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.dom.disable_window_flip.Value to 'true'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.dom.disable_window_flip.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Moving Or Resizing Windows Capability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Javascript window move/resize in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.dom.disable_window_move_resize.Value to 'true'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.dom.disable_window_move_resize.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox network prediction
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable addon and plugin automatic update in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .NetworkPrediction to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to not delete data upon shutdown.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Require default personal certificate be chosen every time in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.Cache to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.Cookies to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.Downloads to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.FormData to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.History to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.Sessions to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.SiteSettings to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.OfflineApps to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting SanitizeOnShutdown.Locked to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: The Firefox New Tab page must not show Top Sites, Sponsored Top sites, Pocket Recommendations, Sponsored Pocket Stories, Searches, Highlights, or Snippets.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable dynamic New Tab features in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.Search to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.TopSites to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.SponsoredTopSites to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.Pocket to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.SponsoredPocket to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.Highlights to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.Snippets to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting FirefoxHome.locked to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to not use a password store with or without a master password.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable password manager in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .PasswordManagerEnabled to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Firefox Pop-up Blocker
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable popup blocking in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting PopupBlocking.Default to 'true'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting PopupBlocking.Locked to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox private browsing must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Private Browsing feature in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisablePrivateBrowsing to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox search suggestions must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable search suggestion in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .SearchSuggestEnabled to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Installed Search Plugins Update Checking
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Search Plugin Updates in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.browser.search.update.Value to 'false'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.browser.search.update.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must be configured to allow only TLS 1.2 or above.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Sync in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .SSLVersionMin to 'tls1.2'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox accounts must be disabled.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Firefox Sync in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableFirefoxAccounts to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Telemetry
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable telemetry in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting .DisableTelemetry to 'true'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Firefox must not recommend extensions as the user is using the browser.
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Disable Extension Recommendation Messages in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting UserMessaging.ExtensionRecommendations to 'false'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Certificate Verification
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check setting of Configure Default Personal Certificate to Ask Every Time in Firefox policy

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test conditions - Firefox policy item is set.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.security.default_personal_cert.Value to 'Ask Every Time'.
Check that Firefox administrative policy setting Preferences.security.default_personal_cert.Status to 'locked'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

oval-def:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

linux:rpminfo_test.comment: Installed version of firefox is greater than 68.4.0
